snippet: The Cardinals' Lance Lynn struck out 12 White Sox while allowing three hits in seven and a third shutout innings last Wednesday, matching R. A. Dickey for the National League lead in victories, with 10.
abstract: The Cardinals' Lance Lynn struck out 12 White Sox while allowing three hits in seven and a third shutout innings last Wednesday, matching R. A. Dickey for the National League lead in victories, with 10.

headline.main: Lynn Having a Breakout Year for the Cardinals
headline.print_headline: Extra Bases: A Breakout for a Cardinal
